item.title: Apple broadens App Store’s age rating system
item.description: Apple has expanded its age rating system to include 13+, 16+, and 18+ ratings, in addition to the existing ratings for younger users.

item.title: Tesla is reportedly behind on its pledge to build 5,000 Optimus bots this year
item.description: Tesla is behind on its goal to produce at least 5,000 Optimus humanoid robots by the end of 2025.

item.title: Meta to stop selling political ads in the EU from October
item.description: In response to the European Union's incoming regulation of political advertising, Meta said on Friday that it would stop selling and showing political...

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make you...

item.title: Somnee Smart Sleep Headband Review: High-Tech Help
item.description: This wearable tech maps your brain using EEG sensors and algorithms, delivering therapeutic stimulation to improve sleep. And it succeeds, sort of.
